57534.en: <voice 00135_00057534><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...<pc>, I heard what he just said too.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57534.ja: <voice 00135_00057534><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……<pc>さん　今の話　私も聞いたわ。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57534.ko: <voice 00135_00057534><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……<pc> 씨. 방금 그 말 나도 들었어.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57534.zh-Hans: <voice 00135_00057534><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……<pc>，刚才的话，我也听到了。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57534.zh-Hant: <voice 00135_00057534><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……<pc>，剛才說的我也聽見了。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57535.en:
<voice 00390_00057535><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...Mister, tell me more. The one with the glittering
book, Sadak, where the heck did he go?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57535.ja:
<voice 00390_00057535><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……おじさん　くわしく聞かせて。
　きらきらした本を持った　サダクは
　いったい　どこに行ったの？<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57535.ko:
<voice 00390_00057535><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……아저씨, 자세히 얘기해 줘요.
　사다크는 반짝이는 책을 들고
　대체 어디로 갔죠?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57535.zh-Hans:
<voice 00390_00057535><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……叔叔，告诉我详细的情况吧。
萨达克拿着闪闪发光的书
去了哪里？<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57535.zh-Hant:
<voice 00390_00057535><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……叔叔，請你告訴我，
拿著亮晶晶的書的薩達克
到底去哪了？<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57536.en:
<voice 00510_00057536><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>Ah, ahh...? He was only here at the tavern for a little
bit, see. As for where he went, I dunno.<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57536.ja:
<voice 00510_00057536><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>「あ　あぁ……？
　アイツなら　少しの間　酒場にいただけだぜ。
　どこに行ったかなんて　知らねえよ。<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57536.ko:
<voice 00510_00057536><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>: 어? 어어……?
　그냥 그 녀석이 잠깐 주점에 있었다는 얘기야.
　어디로 갔는지는 나야 모르지.<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57536.zh-Hans:
<voice 00510_00057536><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>啊……
那家伙只在酒馆坐了一会儿。
我也不知道他去哪里了。<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57536.zh-Hant:
<voice 00510_00057536><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>啥……？
他的話，剛剛在酒館待了一會兒。
但我不知道他去哪了。<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57537.en:
<voice 00660_00057537><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>A-actually, he asked me where Rinja Tower was, and
once I told him, he left right away, so that's
probably where he's headed...<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57537.ja:
<voice 00660_00057537><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>「そ　そういや　リンジャの塔の場所を聞かれて
　教えてやったら　すぐ出ていったから
　たぶん　そこに向かったんだと思うけど……。<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57537.ko:
<voice 00660_00057537><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>: 그, 그러고 보니 린자의 탑이 어디냐고 묻길래
　가르쳐 주자마자 곧바로 나간 걸 보면
　아마 그곳에 간 게 아닌가 싶긴 한데…….<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57537.zh-Hans:
<voice 00660_00057537><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>说起来他问了我林加塔的位置，
我告诉他之后，他立刻就走了。
我想他大概是去那里了吧……<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57537.zh-Hant:
<voice 00660_00057537><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>說、說起來他問我林加塔在哪裡，
我告訴他後他就立刻衝出去了，
所以我想他應該是去林加塔了……<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57538.en:
<voice 00790_00057538><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Is that so... Thanks. With that, I can curse that phony
medium...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57538.ja:
<voice 00790_00057538><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「そう……ありがと。
　これで　あの　インチキ霊媒師を
　呪ってやれるわ……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57538.ko:
<voice 00790_00057538><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 그렇군요…… 고마워요.
　이제 그 사기꾼 영매사를
　저주할 수 있겠네…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57538.zh-Hans:
<voice 00790_00057538><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>这样啊……谢了。
这下我就能诅咒
那个骗人的通灵师了……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57538.zh-Hant:
<voice 00790_00057538><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>這樣啊……謝謝。
這樣就能詛咒那個可疑的靈媒了……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57539.en: <voice 00900_00057539><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...By the way, what's with the leaf?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57539.ja: <voice 00900_00057539><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……ところで　その葉っぱ　なんなの？<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57539.ko: <voice 00900_00057539><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……그런데 그 풀은 뭐예요?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57539.zh-Hans: <voice 00900_00057539><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……说起来，那个叶子是什么东西？<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57539.zh-Hant: <voice 00900_00057539><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……說起來，那個葉子是什麼？<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57540.en:
<voice 00960_00057540><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>Ohh, Softwort, I use that stuff all the time! Even
when I get super smashed, one shot of this sobers me
up!<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57540.ja:
<voice 00960_00057540><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>「おう　こいつぁ　きつけそうっていってな！
　ベロベロに酔っぱらった時でも
　こいつがあれば　一発で目が覚めるんだぜ！<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57540.ko:
<voice 00960_00057540><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>: 아, 이건 각성초라는 거야!
　술에 취해 헤롱헤롱거릴 때도
　이게 있으면 단번에 정신을 차릴 수 있지!<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57540.zh-Hans:
<voice 00960_00057540><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>哦，这个是复苏草！
醉得不省人事的时候，
只要有这个，一下子就能清醒过来！<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57540.zh-Hant:
<voice 00960_00057540><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>喔！這是爽健草！
喝到爛醉的時候，
只要用這個瞬間就會清醒過來！<stop_lip_animation n02172 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57541.en:
<voice 01040_00057541><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...Hmmm. Trying to cure it after rather than taking it
in the first place, seems stupid.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57541.ja:
<voice 01040_00057541><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……ふぅん。
　後から　薬で治そうとするくらいなら
　そもそも飲まなきゃいいのに　バカみたい。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57541.ko:
<voice 01040_00057541><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……흐음.
　나중에 굳이 약을 쓸 정도라면
　아예 마시지 않으면 될 텐데 바보 같네요.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57541.zh-Hans:
<voice 01040_00057541><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……哼。
喝完再用药来治，
还不如根本就不要喝呢，像傻子似的。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57541.zh-Hant:
<voice 01040_00057541><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……是嗎？
要是想仰賴藥物，
一開始別喝不就好了，真蠢。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57542.en:
<voice 01135_00057542><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I'm going to Rinja Tower so I can track
down Sadak and the diary. I'd really
appreciate if you could come with me.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57542.ja:
<voice 01135_00057542><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「私　姉さんの日記を盗んだ　サダクを追って
　リンジャの塔まで　行ってみるわ。
　<pc>さんも　一緒に来てちょうだい。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57542.ko:
<voice 01135_00057542><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 난 언니의 일기를 훔쳐 간 사다크를 쫓아서
　린자의 탑까지 가 볼게.
　<pc> 씨도 함께 와 줘.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57542.zh-Hans:
<voice 01135_00057542><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>萨达克偷了姐姐的日记，
我要去林加塔找他。
<pc>也要跟我一起去。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57542.zh-Hant:
<voice 01135_00057542><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>我要去林加塔追
偷了姊姊日記的薩達克。
<pc>也請一起來吧。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57543.en:
<voice 01185_00057543><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>You can get there by heading north from
Celedot Mountain Pass, and then it's just
past the coast ruins. I'll see you there...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57543.ja:
<voice 01185_00057543><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「リンジャの塔は　セレドット山道を北に進んで
　リンジャハル海岸の　遺跡を抜ければ
　見えてくるわ。それじゃ　よろしくね……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57543.ko:
<voice 01185_00057543><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 린자의 탑은 셀레도트 산길을 북쪽으로
　따라가다 린자하르 해안의 유적을 빠져나가면
　보일 거야. 그럼 잘 부탁해…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57543.zh-Hans:
<voice 01185_00057543><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>由塞莱德特山道向北，
穿过林加哈尔海岸的遗迹就能看到林加塔了。
那就拜托你了……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57543.zh-Hant:
<voice 01185_00057543><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>林加塔在出了塞萊德特山道後向北前進，
穿過林加哈爾海岸的遺跡後就會看到了。
那就麻煩了……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57544.en: <voice 00345_00057544><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...<pc>, over here.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57544.ja: <voice 00345_00057544><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……<pc>さん　こっちよ。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57544.ko: <voice 00345_00057544><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……<pc> 씨, 이쪽이야.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57545.en:
<voice 00605_00057545><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>So you're the Black Mask! For someone such as
yourself to meet with me, I am deeply humbled.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57545.ja:
<voice 00605_00057545><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「これは　黒仮面どの。
　私のような者のため　ご足労いただけるとは
　このサダク　恐縮の至りであります。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57545.ko:
<voice 00605_00057545><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 아이고, 이거 흑가면님.
　저 같은 걸 위해서 어려운 걸음을 하시다니
　이 사다크, 몸 둘 바를 모르겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57545.zh-Hans:
<voice 00605_00057545><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>黑色假面大人，
为了我这样的人，劳您赶来这里，
萨达克我真是惶恐至极。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57545.zh-Hant:
<voice 00605_00057545><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>黑假面大人。
您竟為了像我這樣的小人物移駕，
薩達克我真是誠惶誠恐。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57546.zh-Hans: <voice 00675_00057546><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>……东西给他。<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57546.zh-Hant: <voice 00675_00057546><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>……把東西給他。<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57548.en:
<voice 01275_00057548><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Ooh... So this is that Evil Prayer Statue...
How wonderful...<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57548.ja:
<voice 01275_00057548><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「おぉ……これが　あの祈願の魔像。
　なんと　素晴らしい……。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57548.ko:
<voice 01275_00057548><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 오오…… 이게 바로 기원의 마상이군요.
　너무나도 훌륭합니다…….<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57548.zh-Hans:
<voice 01275_00057548><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>哦……这就是那个祈愿魔像。
真是太棒了……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57548.zh-Hant:
<voice 01275_00057548><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>喔喔……這就是祈願魔像。
真是太棒了……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57549.en: <voice 01415_00057549><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>...How is the plan coming along?<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57549.ja: <voice 01415_00057549><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>「……計画は　順調なのか？<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57549.zh-Hans: <voice 01415_00057549><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>……计划顺利吗？<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57549.zh-Hant: <voice 01415_00057549><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>……計畫還順利嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57550.en:
<voice 01470_00057550><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>The townsfolk are completely under my control. All
that's left is to put on the finishing touches.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57550.ja:
<voice 01470_00057550><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「町の連中は　完全に手中に収めました。
　あとは　最後の仕上げにかかるだけです。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57550.ko:
<voice 01470_00057550><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 마을 녀석들은 완벽히 제 손바닥 안입니다.
　이제 마지막 마무리만 남았죠.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57550.zh-Hans:
<voice 01470_00057550><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>镇上的人已经全都被我控制了。
现在只差最后一步了。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57550.zh-Hant:
<voice 01470_00057550><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>鎮上的人們都在我的掌握中，
只剩下最後一個步驟就完成了。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57551.en:
<voice 01520_00057551><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>When the adults pray to this statue, their prayers will
cause Celed to completely merge into the false world.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57551.ja:
<voice 01520_00057551><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「この像に　町の大人どもが　祈りを捧げれば
　その祈りのチカラで　セレドの町一帯は
　偽りの世界に　完全に侵食されることでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57551.ko:
<voice 01520_00057551><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 이 조각에 마을 어른들이 기도를 올리면
　그 기도의 힘으로 셀레도 마을 일대는
　가짜 세계에 완전히 잠식당할 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57551.zh-Hans:
<voice 01520_00057551><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>只要镇上的大人们向这尊魔像献上祈祷，
祈祷的力量就能让塞莱德镇一带
完全被虚假世界侵蚀。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57551.zh-Hant:
<voice 01520_00057551><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>只要讓鎮上的大人們向這座魔像祈禱，
信仰的力量就能讓虛偽世界
完全吞噬塞萊德鎮一帶吧。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57552.en:
<voice 01550_00057552><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>They all completely trust me without any idea of what's
in store for them... Kukuku...<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57552.ja:
<voice 01550_00057552><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「自分たちが　どうなる運命かも知らずに
　奴らは　すっかり私を　信じ切っていますよ。
　クックックッ……。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57552.ko:
<voice 01550_00057552><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 자기들이 어떻게 될 운명인지도 모르고
　놈들은 저를 철석같이 믿고 있죠.
　크크크…….<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57552.zh-Hans:
<voice 01550_00057552><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>完全不知道等待自己的是怎样的命运，
那群家伙已经彻底相信我了。
呵呵呵……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57552.zh-Hant:
<voice 01550_00057552><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>連自己即將遭受的命運都不知道，
這些蠢蛋還百分百相信我。
呵呵呵……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57553.en: <voice 01725_00057553><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>...What is that?<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57553.zh-Hant: <voice 01725_00057553><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>……那是什麼？<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57554.en:
<voice 01831_00057554><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>It belonged to this annoying little human
girl... It mentioned something about the
false world, I think...<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57554.ja:
<voice 01831_00057554><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「これは　私のジャマをしようとする
　人間の小娘が　持っていた物で　なんでも
　偽りの世界のことが　書かれているとか……。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57554.ko:
<voice 01831_00057554><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 이건 절 방해하려는
　인간 계집애가 들고 있던 물건인데
　가짜 세계에 대해 쓰여 있다나, 뭐라나…….<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57554.zh-Hans:
<voice 01831_00057554><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>有个人类小姑娘企图妨碍我，
这是她的东西，
说是写着虚假世界里发生的事……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57554.zh-Hant:
<voice 01831_00057554><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>這是企圖要妨礙我的
人類小姑娘拿著的東西，
上面好像寫了虛偽世界發生的事……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57555.en:
<voice 01890_00057555><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>I took it just to be safe, but I doubt anyone would
believe her anyways. It matters not.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57555.ja:
<voice 01890_00057555><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「万が一を考えて　奪っておきましたが
　誰も　あの小娘のことなど　信じていますまい。
　取るに足らない　つまらない物ですよ。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57555.ko:
<voice 01890_00057555><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 혹시 몰라서 빼앗아 두긴 했지만
　아무도 그 계집애 말은 믿지 않을 겁니다.
　정말 별것 아닙니다.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57555.zh-Hans:
<voice 01890_00057555><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>我为了以防万一，先抢过来了。
谁都不相信那个小姑娘的话。
这个也是不值一提的东西。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57555.zh-Hant:
<voice 01890_00057555><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>為防萬一我搶了過來，
但沒人相信那小姑娘說的話。
不過是個不值一提的垃圾罷了。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57556.en: <voice 01930_00057556><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>...If it's a problem, then get rid of it. Now.<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57556.ja: <voice 01930_00057556><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>「……ジャマな物なら　さっさと始末しておけ。<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57556.ko: <voice 01930_00057556><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>: ……걸리적거릴 것 같으면 빨리 처리해 둬라.<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57556.zh-Hans: <voice 01930_00057556><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>……会妨碍我们的东西，要迅速处理掉。<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57556.zh-Hant: <voice 01930_00057556><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>……既然會妨礙到你，就趕快處理掉。<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57557.ja: <voice 01970_00057557><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「は……はいっ。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57557.ko: <voice 01970_00057557><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 앗…… 네.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57559.en:
<voice 02390_00057559><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>...Any signs of worry you must nip in the bud immediately,
no matter how small. You must not underestimate
humans.<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57559.ja:
<voice 02390_00057559><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>「……どんなに　ささいなことでも
　不安の芽は　早めに　つみとることだ。
　人間を甘く見て　足を　すくわれんようにな。<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57559.ko:
<voice 02390_00057559><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>: ……아무리 사소한 것이라도
　불안의 싹은 일찌감치 뽑아 둬야 하는 법.
　인간을 얕보다가 괜히 발목 잡히지 마라.<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57559.zh-Hans:
<voice 02390_00057559><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>……不管是多么小的事，
一旦发现可疑的苗头就要尽早解决。
你太小看人类，小心摔跟头。<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57559.zh-Hant:
<voice 02390_00057559><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>……不論多麼微小，
只要有疑慮就應該盡快斬草除根。
可別因為小看人類而吃虧了。<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57560.en: <voice 02730_00057560><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>...Hmph! You're really afraid of what humans can do? Ridiculous...<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57560.ja:
<voice 02730_00057560><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「……ふん！　人間ごときを　恐れるなんて
　まったく　器の小さい　おくびょう者ですねぇ。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57560.ko:
<voice 02730_00057560><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: ……흥! 인간 따위를 겁내다니
　소심한 겁쟁이로군 그래.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57560.zh-Hans:
<voice 02730_00057560><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>……哼！居然会惧怕人类，
真是个干不了大事的胆小鬼。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57560.zh-Hant:
<voice 02730_00057560><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>……哼！竟然害怕區區人類，
還真是個胸襟狹小的膽小鬼。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57561.en:
<voice 02846_00057561><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>As long as I have this, my plan is as good as done.
Then, once the False World's merge is complete, I'll
have any promotion I want...<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57561.ja:
<voice 02846_00057561><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「これさえあれば　計画は成ったも同然。
　そして　偽りの世界の侵食を果たせば
　私の出世も　思うがままとなる……。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57561.ko:
<voice 02846_00057561><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 이것만 있으면 계획은 이뤄진 거나 마찬가지.
　그리고 가짜 세계의 잠식이 끝나면
　내 출셋길도 탄탄대로야…….<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57561.zh-Hans:
<voice 02846_00057561><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>只要有这个东西，我的计划就等于成功了。
等虚假世界完全侵蚀这里之后，
我就能出人头地了……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57561.zh-Hant:
<voice 02846_00057561><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>只要有了這個，計畫也就等於成功了。
只要完成虛偽世界的侵蝕，
我就能出人頭地了……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57562.en: <voice 02921_00057562><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Kuku... Now then, time for the finishing touches!<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57562.ja:
<voice 02921_00057562><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「ククッ……。
　では　最後の仕上げといきますか！<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57562.ko:
<voice 02921_00057562><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 크큭…….
　그럼 마무리를 하러 가 보실까!<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57562.zh-Hans:
<voice 02921_00057562><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>呵呵……
那就来完成最后一步吧！<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57562.zh-Hant:
<voice 02921_00057562><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>呵呵……
那麼來準備收尾吧！<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57563.en: <voice 03401_00057563><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>My sister and I's... It was our sole connection...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57563.ja:
<voice 03401_00057563><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「私と　姉さんの……
　たったひとつの絆だったのに……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57563.ko:
<voice 03401_00057563><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 나와 언니의……
　단 하나뿐인 유대감이었는데…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57563.zh-Hans:
<voice 03401_00057563><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>那是我和姐姐……
唯一的羁绊……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57563.zh-Hant:
<voice 03401_00057563><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>那是我和姊姊……
唯一的羈絆……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57564.en:
<voice 03616_00057564><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Sadak is mingling with monsters... If we
don't do something, everyone will be in
danger. We have to tell everyone!<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57564.ja:
<voice 03616_00057564><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「サダクが　魔物と通じていたなんて……。
　このままだと　町が危ないわ。
　みんなに　このことを知らせなきゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57564.ko:
<voice 03616_00057564><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 사다크가 마물과 한통속이었다니…….
　이대로 있다가는 마을이 위험해져.
　모두에게 이 사실을 알려야 해.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57564.zh-Hans:
<voice 03616_00057564><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>萨达克居然和怪物勾结在一起……
这样下去的话，镇子会有危险的。
要快点通知大家……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57564.zh-Hant:
<voice 03616_00057564><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>薩達克和怪物竟然是一夥的……
這樣下去塞萊德鎮就糟糕了。
我得趕快通知大家才行。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57565.en:
<voice 03796_00057565><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...I'll hurry back, <pc>, please come back to
Celed too.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57565.ja:
<voice 03796_00057565><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……私　急いで戻るから
　<pc>さんも
　セレドの町まで　来てちょうだい。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57565.ko:
<voice 03796_00057565><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……난 서둘러 돌아갈 테니까
　<pc> 씨도
　셀레도 마을로 와 줘.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57565.zh-Hans:
<voice 03796_00057565><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……我会迅速赶回去的，
<pc>也要快点赶回塞莱德镇。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57565.zh-Hant:
<voice 03796_00057565><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……我得盡快回去，
也請<pc>
來塞萊德鎮吧。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000072.en: <voice 03618_29000072><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>What's wrong, Anlucia?<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000072.ja: <voice 03618_29000072><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>「どうしたの？　アンルシアさん？<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000072.ko: <voice 03618_29000072><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>: 왜 그래? 안루시아 씨?<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000072.zh-Hans: <voice 03618_29000072><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>怎么了？安露西雅小姐。<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000072.zh-Hant: <voice 03618_29000072><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>怎麼了？安露西亞。<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000073.en: <voice 03619_29000073><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>No... It's nothing.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000073.ja:
<voice 03619_29000073><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「いえ……
　……なんでもないわ。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000073.ko:
<voice 03619_29000073><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 아니……
　……아무것도 아니야.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000073.zh-Hans:
<voice 03619_29000073><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>没有……
……没什么。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000073.zh-Hant:
<voice 03619_29000073><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>沒有……
……沒什麼。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

81793.en:
Inside the Assembly Hall, a soothing aroma filled the
air...
81793.ja:
集会所の中は　安らぐ香りで
満たされている……。
81793.ko:
집회소 안은 평안의 향으로
가득 차 있다…….
81793.zh-Hans:
集会所中充满着
令人心神安宁的香气……
81793.zh-Hant:
集會所裡充滿了
令人放鬆的香氣……

57567.en:
<voice 00250_00057567><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>...Everyone, since last time, I went on a journey and
found a way to save the town. Now, please turn your
focus to this statue.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57567.ja:
<voice 00250_00057567><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「……皆さん。あれから　ぼくは旅に出て
　この町が救われる方法を　探してきました。
　さあ　この　祈願の魔像をごらんください。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57567.ko:
<voice 00250_00057567><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: ……여러분. 그 후로 저는 길을 떠났고
　이 마을을 구할 방법을 찾아서 돌아왔습니다.
　자, 이 기원의 마상을 보십시오.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57567.zh-Hans:
<voice 00250_00057567><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>……各位，自上次的集会后，
我便踏上了旅途并找到了拯救这个镇子的方法，
来，请看这尊祈愿魔像。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57567.zh-Hant:
<voice 00250_00057567><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>……各位，從那之後，我四處旅行，
終於找到可以解救這座市鎮的辦法。
來吧，請看這個祈願魔像。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57568.en:
<voice 00526_00057568><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>In order to summon the spirits here, you
must show the power of prayer... Now,
please pray to this Prayer Statue!<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57568.ja:
<voice 00526_00057568><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「霊を呼びだし　話を聞いてもらうには
　祈りのチカラが必要……。この祈願の魔像に
　祈りを捧げ　チカラをたくわえるのです。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57568.ko:
<voice 00526_00057568><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 영혼을 불러내 이야기를 하려면
　기도의 힘이 필요하죠……. 이 기원의 마상에
　기도를 올려 힘을 모읍시다.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57568.zh-Hans:
<voice 00526_00057568><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>想要召唤出幽灵，和他们对话，
就需要祈祷的力量……只要向着这尊
祈愿魔像进行祈祷，力量就会储存起来。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57568.zh-Hant:
<voice 00526_00057568><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>想喚出幽靈並與其交涉就需要祈禱的力量……
因此得向此祈願魔像獻上祈禱，
增幅它的力量。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57569.en:
<voice 00588_00057569><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>If the statue is filled with your prayers,
it will extinguish the children's grudges,
and they shall return here...<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57569.ja:
<voice 00588_00057569><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「像が　祈りのチカラで　満たされれば
　悪霊と化した　子供たちの　恨みを消し去り
　この場に　呼びだしてくれるはず……。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57569.ko:
<voice 00588_00057569><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 그렇게 기도의 힘을 가득 채우면
　악령으로 변한 아이들의 원한을 없애고
　이곳에 불러낼 수 있을 겁니다…….<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57569.zh-Hans:
<voice 00588_00057569><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>只要魔像充满了祈祷的力量，
它就会消去化为恶灵的孩子们心中的怨恨，
将他们召唤到这里……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57569.zh-Hant:
<voice 00588_00057569><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>只要魔像充滿信仰之力，
就會驅散化作惡靈的孩子們的怨恨，
呼喚他們回來這裡……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

81794.en:
<voice 00628_00081794><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Now, I ask you to bow down to this statue
and pray! Ask the children for your
forgiveness, and you shall all be saved!<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
81794.ja:
<voice 00628_00081794><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「さあ　この像にかしずき　祈りましょう！
　そして　呼びだした子供たちの霊に
　許しを乞えば　あなたがたは　救われるのです！<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
81794.ko:
<voice 00628_00081794><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 자, 이 마상을 우러러 기도합시다!
　그리고 불러낸 아이들의 영혼에
　용서를 빌면 여러분은 구원받을 것입니다!<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
81794.zh-Hans:
<voice 00628_00081794><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>来吧，去除心中的杂念，对着魔像祈祷吧！
向魔像召唤来的孩子们的幽灵祈求原谅，
你们就一定能得到救赎！<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
81794.zh-Hant:
<voice 00628_00081794><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>來，好好向著這座雕像祈禱吧！
接著向召喚來的孩子們的靈魂
乞求原諒，你們就會得救！<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57571.ja: <voice 00718_00057571><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「リゼロッタ……。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57571.zh-Hans: <voice 00718_00057571><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>丽泽萝妲……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57571.zh-Hant: <voice 00718_00057571><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>莉賽蘿塔……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

81795.en: <voice 00758_00081795><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Please forgive me...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
81795.ja: <voice 00758_00081795><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「どうか　私を許してくれ……。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
81795.ko: <voice 00758_00081795><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 부디 나를 용서해 다오…….<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
81795.zh-Hans: <voice 00758_00081795><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>请一定要原谅我……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57593.zh-Hans:
<voice 00085_00057593><start_lip_sync m13003 _normal m00001>没、没想到我……
会被打败……<stop_lip_animation m13003 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57593.zh-Hant:
<voice 00085_00057593><start_lip_sync m13003 _normal m00001>我、我竟然……
會輸……<stop_lip_animation m13003 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57594.en:
<voice 00215_00057594><start_lip_sync m13003 _normal m00001>But, I'll have my revenge in death!! Little girl!
Even if it's only you...!<stop_lip_animation m13003 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57594.ja:
<voice 00215_00057594><start_lip_sync m13003 _normal m00001>「だが　ただでは死なぬ！！
　小娘ッ！　せめて　貴様だけでもっ……！<stop_lip_animation m13003 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57594.ko:
<voice 00215_00057594><start_lip_sync m13003 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그냥은 못 죽지!!
　이 계집애! 적어도 너는 내가……!<stop_lip_animation m13003 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57594.zh-Hans:
<voice 00215_00057594><start_lip_sync m13003 _normal m00001>但是我不会白死的！
小姑娘！至少我要把你……<stop_lip_animation m13003 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57594.zh-Hant:
<voice 00215_00057594><start_lip_sync m13003 _normal m00001>我可不會白白死在這裡！！
妳這小丫頭！就算只有妳，我也要……！<stop_lip_animation m13003 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57596.en: <voice 00649_00057596><start_lip_sync m13003 _normal m00001>I-I was wrong... To underestimate... You humans...<stop_lip_animation m13003 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57596.ja:
<voice 00649_00057596><start_lip_sync m13003 _normal m00001>「に　人間を……甘く見ていたか……。
　ぬかっ……たわ……。<stop_lip_animation m13003 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57596.ko:
<voice 00649_00057596><start_lip_sync m13003 _normal m00001>: 이, 인간을…… 얕보았군…….
　방심……했다…….<stop_lip_animation m13003 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57596.zh-Hans:
<voice 00649_00057596><start_lip_sync m13003 _normal m00001>我太小看……人类了吗……
太大……意了……<stop_lip_animation m13003 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57596.zh-Hant:
<voice 00649_00057596><start_lip_sync m13003 _normal m00001>我、我太小看人類了嗎……
太……大意了……<stop_lip_animation m13003 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57598.en: <voice 00908_00057598><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Papa! What's wrong!? By chance, just now, did you...!<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57598.ja:
<voice 00908_00057598><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「パパッ！　どうしたの！？
　もしかして　今ので……！<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57598.ko:
<voice 00908_00057598><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 아빠! 왜 그래요!?
　혹시 방금 그것 때문에……!<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57598.zh-Hans:
<voice 00908_00057598><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>爸爸！你怎么了？
难道说刚才那一击……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57598.zh-Hant:
<voice 00908_00057598><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>爸爸！怎麼了！？
難道是剛才那一擊……！<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57599.en:
<voice 00958_00057599><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>No... When I pushed you away, your elbow got me right
in the stomach...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57599.ja:
<voice 00958_00057599><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「いや……　突き飛ばした時に
　お前のヒジが　みぞおちに入ってな……。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57599.ko:
<voice 00958_00057599><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 아니…… 몸을 던졌을 때
　네 팔꿈치에 명치를 부딪혔다…….<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57599.zh-Hans:
<voice 00958_00057599><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>不是……刚才被打飞的时候，
你的手肘戳到我的心窝了……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57599.zh-Hant:
<voice 00958_00057599><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>沒事……只是剛剛被打飛的時候，
妳的手肘恰好打中我的肋骨……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57600.en: <voice 01018_00057600><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...Don't scare me like that anymore.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57600.ja: <voice 01018_00057600><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……もう　おどかさないで。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57600.zh-Hans: <voice 01018_00057600><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……真是的，不要吓我啊。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57600.zh-Hant: <voice 01018_00057600><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……受不了，別嚇我啦。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57601.en:
<voice 01268_00057601><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Thanks to Sadak's death, the Evil Prayer Statue was
destroyed and the River of Light appears to have
returned to normal...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57601.ja:
<voice 01268_00057601><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「サダクが死んで　祈願の魔像も壊れたおかげで
　光の河も　元の姿に戻ったみたい……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57601.ko:
<voice 01268_00057601><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 사다크가 죽고 기원의 마상도 부서진 덕에
　빛의 강도 원래 모습을 되찾은 것 같아…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57601.zh-Hans:
<voice 01268_00057601><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>萨达克死了，祈愿魔像也被破坏了，
光之河也因此恢复了原来的样子……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57601.zh-Hant:
<voice 01268_00057601><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>薩達克已死，祈願魔像也被毀了，
光河終於恢復了原狀……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57602.en:
<voice 01308_00057602><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Sadak tried to use the adults' hearts to merge the
world of the dead, where my sister and the others are
with this world...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57602.ja:
<voice 01308_00057602><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「サダクは　大人たちの心を利用して
　姉さんたちがいる　死の世界で
　こちらの世界を　ぬりつぶそうとしたのね……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57602.ko:
<voice 01308_00057602><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 사다크는 어른들의 마음을 이용해서
　언니와 아이들이 있는 죽음의 세계로
　이쪽 세계를 뒤덮을 속셈이었구나…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57602.zh-Hans:
<voice 01308_00057602><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>萨达克利用了大人们的想法，
想用姐姐所在的死后的世界
抹除这边的世界……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57602.zh-Hant:
<voice 01308_00057602><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>薩達克利用大人們的心理，
想用姊姊她們所在的死後世界，
來取代我們的世界……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57603.en:
<voice 01393_00057603><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>...<cs_pchero>, thanks to you this town is
saved. Truly, thank you very much.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57603.ja:
<voice 01393_00057603><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「……<cs_pchero>さん　あなたのおかげで
　この町は　救われました。
　本当に　ありがとうございます。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57603.ko:
<voice 01393_00057603><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: ……<cs_pchero> 씨, 당신 덕분에
　이 마을은 살아남았습니다.
　정말로 감사합니다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57603.zh-Hans:
<voice 01393_00057603><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……<cs_pchero>，
多亏了你镇子才得救了。
真的很谢谢你。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57603.zh-Hant:
<voice 01393_00057603><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……<cs_pchero>，多虧了你，
塞萊德鎮才得救了。
真的很謝謝你。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57604.en:
<voice 01464_00057604><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>My failure to see that man's true colors nearly
caused irreparable damage...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57604.ja:
<voice 01464_00057604><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「私が　あの男の正体を見抜けなかったせいで
　取り返しのつかない事態を
　引き起こしてしまうところでした……。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57604.ko:
<voice 01464_00057604><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 제가 그 사내의 정체를 알아보지 못한 탓에
　돌이킬 수 없는 사태를
　일으킬 뻔했습니다…….<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57604.zh-Hans:
<voice 01464_00057604><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>因为我没能看穿那个男人的真面目，
差点发生了无法挽回的悲剧……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57604.zh-Hant:
<voice 01464_00057604><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>都是因為我沒看出
那個男人心懷不軌，
事情才變得一發不可收拾……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57606.en: <voice 02133_00057606><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Could those be...?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57606.ja: <voice 02133_00057606><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「あれは　もしかして……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57606.ko: <voice 02133_00057606><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 저건 혹시…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57606.zh-Hans: <voice 02133_00057606><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>那个难道是……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57606.zh-Hant: <voice 02133_00057606><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>那該不會是……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57607.en:
<voice 02203_00057607><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...The merge must still be going on! Papa, hurry, and
get everyone in town to take shelter at Alltrades
Abbey!<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57607.ja:
<voice 02203_00057607><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……まだ　侵食は続いているんだわ！
　パパ！　急いで　町のみんなを
　ダーマ神殿へ　避難させましょう！<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57607.ko:
<voice 02203_00057607><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……아직 잠식은 계속되고 있어!
　아빠! 빨리 마을 사람들을
　다마 신전으로 피신시켜야 해요!<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57607.zh-Hans:
<voice 02203_00057607><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……侵蚀并没有停止！
爸爸，快让镇上的人都去达玛神殿避难！<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57607.zh-Hant:
<voice 02203_00057607><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……侵蝕還在繼續！
爸爸！快讓鎮上的大家
去達瑪神殿避難！<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57608.en:
<voice 02243_00057608><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Was it not already over!? B-but, if you say so... I will
tell everyone in town!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57608.ja:
<voice 02243_00057608><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「すべて　終わったのではなかったのかっ！？
　だ　だが　お前がそう言うのなら……
　私は　町の皆さんに　声をかけてくる！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57608.ko:
<voice 02243_00057608><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 전부 끝난 게 아니란 말이냐!?
　하, 하지만 네 말이 그렇다면……
　내가 마을 사람들에게 알리고 오마!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57608.zh-Hans:
<voice 02243_00057608><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>这一切难道还没有结束？
不、不过既然你这么说……
我去叫镇上的人去避难！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57608.zh-Hant:
<voice 02243_00057608><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>還沒結束嗎！？
不、不過，既然你這麼說了……
我去叫大家避難！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57609.en:
<voice 02390_00057609><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, sorry, but can you come with us? I
want you to be there to see it too...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57609.ja:
<voice 02390_00057609><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>さん　悪いけど
　一緒に　来てくれない？
　あなたにも　見届けてほしいの……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57609.ko:
<voice 02390_00057609><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero> 씨, 미안하지만
　함께 와 줄 수 있어?
　당신도 지켜봤으면 좋겠어…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57609.zh-Hans:
<voice 02390_00057609><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，抱歉，
可以和我一起来吗？
我希望你也能一起见证接下来的事……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57609.zh-Hant:
<voice 02390_00057609><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，不好意思，
你能一起來一趟嗎？
我想讓你見證這一切……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57610.en: <voice 02430_00057610><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...Ok, I'll be waiting in Alltrades Abbey's chapel.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57610.ja:
<voice 02430_00057610><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……それじゃ　ダーマ神殿の
　礼拝堂で　待ってるわね。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57610.ko:
<voice 02430_00057610><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……그럼 다마 신전의
　예배당에서 기다릴게.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57610.zh-Hans:
<voice 02430_00057610><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……那我在达玛神殿的
礼拜堂等着你。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57610.zh-Hant:
<voice 02430_00057610><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……那我在達瑪神殿的
禮拜堂等你。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57611.en: <voice 00150_00057611><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Hmm, looks like everyone made it here safely.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57611.ja: <voice 00150_00057611><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「ふむ。ここまで来れば　もう大丈夫だな。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57611.ko: <voice 00150_00057611><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 흐음. 여기까지 왔으니 이제 괜찮겠지.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57611.zh-Hans: <voice 00150_00057611><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>嗯，到这里就安全了吧。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57611.zh-Hant: <voice 00150_00057611><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>嗯嗯，到這裡來應該就沒問題了吧。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57612.en:
<voice 00230_00057612><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...I'm sorry, Papa. About saying the merge was still
happening, that was a lie.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57612.ja:
<voice 00230_00057612><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……ごめんなさい　パパ。
　侵食が続いてるというのは　ウソよ。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57612.ko:
<voice 00230_00057612><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……미안해요, 아빠.
　잠식이 계속되고 있다는 건 거짓말이에요.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57612.zh-Hans:
<voice 00230_00057612><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……对不起，爸爸。
说侵蚀还在继续是我骗你的。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57612.zh-Hant:
<voice 00230_00057612><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……對不起，爸爸，
說侵蝕還在繼續是騙人的。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57613.en:
<voice 00350_00057613><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I brought everyone to Alltrades Abbey for another
reason. I'm sure this is our last chance...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57613.ja:
<voice 00350_00057613><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「ダーマ神殿まで　みんなを連れてきたのは
　別の目的があったの。
　きっと　これが最後のチャンスよ……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57613.ko:
<voice 00350_00057613><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 다마 신전까지 모두를 오게 한 건
　다른 목적 때문이에요.
　이번이 분명 마지막 기회일 거예요…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57613.zh-Hans:
<voice 00350_00057613><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>把大家带到达玛神殿
是因为别的原因。
这应该是最后的机会了……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57613.zh-Hant:
<voice 00350_00057613><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>我讓你帶大家來達瑪神殿，
是為了別的目的。
這應該是最後的機會了……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57614.en:
<voice 00435_00057614><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...Everyone, do you remember. In the old days, coming
here to pick up all us kids?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57614.ja:
<voice 00435_00057614><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……みんな　思いだして。
　昔は毎日　私たち子供を迎えに
　この礼拝堂まで　来てくれてたでしょ？<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57614.ko:
<voice 00435_00057614><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……모두 떠올려 보세요.
　옛날에는 날마다 아이들을 데리러
　이 예배당까지 왔었죠?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57614.zh-Hans:
<voice 00435_00057614><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……大家快点回忆起来。
以前大人们每天都来这个礼拜堂
接孩子们的，对吧？<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57614.zh-Hant:
<voice 00435_00057614><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……請各位回想一下。
以前每一天，你們都會為了
接孩子們來這個禮拜堂吧？<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57615.en:
<voice 00620_00057615><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>My sister and the others believe that someday the
adults will come back to get them, so every day, they
keep praying at Alltrades Abbey...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57615.ja:
<voice 00620_00057615><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「姉さんたちは　いつか　大人たちが
　迎えにきてくれると信じて
　毎日　ダーマ神殿で　祈りつづけているの……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57615.ko:
<voice 00620_00057615><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 언니와 아이들은 언젠가 어른들이
　데리러 와 줄 거라 믿고
　매일 다마 신전에서 기도하고 있어요…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57615.zh-Hans:
<voice 00620_00057615><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>姐姐她们相信大人们总有一天
会来接她们回家，
每天都在达玛神殿不断地祈祷……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57615.zh-Hant:
<voice 00620_00057615><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>姊姊她們也相信，
總有一天大人們會來迎接自己，
每天都在達瑪神殿祈禱……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57616.en: <voice 00700_00057616><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...That's right, even now.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57616.ja: <voice 00700_00057616><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……そう　今でも。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57616.zh-Hans: <voice 00700_00057616><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……没错，现在也在祈祷。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57616.zh-Hant: <voice 00700_00057616><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……沒錯，直到現在。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57617.en: <voice 01410_00057617><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>Lucolia... And Papa and Mama?<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57617.ja: <voice 01410_00057617><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「ルコリア……それに　パパとママ？<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57617.ko: <voice 01410_00057617><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 루코리아…… 아빠? 엄마?<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57617.zh-Hans: <voice 01410_00057617><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>露珂莉娅……还有爸爸、妈妈？<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57617.zh-Hant: <voice 01410_00057617><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>露可莉亞……還有爸爸和媽媽？<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57618.en: <voice 01550_00057618><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>What in the world...?<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57618.ja: <voice 01550_00057618><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「これは　いったい……？<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57618.ko: <voice 01550_00057618><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 이게 무슨……?<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57618.zh-Hans: <voice 01550_00057618><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>这究竟是？！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57618.zh-Hant: <voice 01550_00057618><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>這到底是……？<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57619.en:
<voice 01590_00057619><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Sadak was telling the truth. He wanted to use the
power of prayer to join the world we're in and the
world of the dead.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57619.ja:
<voice 01590_00057619><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「サダクは　本当のことも言ってたのよ。
　祈りのチカラを利用して　私たちがいる世界に
　死の世界を　重ねようとしていたの。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57619.ko:
<voice 01590_00057619><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 사다크의 말 중에는 진실도 있었어요.
　기도의 힘을 이용해서 우리가 있는 세계를
　죽음의 세계로 덮으려고 했죠.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57619.zh-Hans:
<voice 01590_00057619><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>萨达克的话也不全是假的。
只要利用祈祷的力量，我们所在的世界
就能和死后的世界重叠在一起。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57619.zh-Hant:
<voice 01590_00057619><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>薩達克說的也不全是假的。
利用祈禱的力量，能將我們所在的世界
和死後的世界重疊在一起。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57620.en:
<voice 01605_00057620><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>If the Evil Prayer Statue was still in effect, the two
worlds would be joined, and I figured we could meet
my late sister and the others...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57620.ja:
<voice 01605_00057620><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「祈願の魔像の影響が残ってる　今なら
　ふたつの世界が重なって　死んだ姉さんたちに
　会えるんじゃないかと　思ったのよ……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57620.ko:
<voice 01605_00057620><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 기원의 마상의 영향이 남은 지금이라면
　두 세계가 겹쳐져서 죽은 언니와 아이들을
　만날 수 있을 것 같았어요…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57620.zh-Hans:
<voice 01605_00057620><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>现在祈愿魔像带来的影响还没有完全消失，
我猜两个世界重叠在一起的时候，
是不是能见到死去的姐姐她们……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57620.zh-Hant:
<voice 01605_00057620><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>祈願魔像的影響還在，
趁現在兩個世界還重疊在一起的時候，
我想也許能見到死去的姊姊她們……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57621.ja: <voice 01640_00057621><start_lip_sync n02052 _normal m00001>「パパッ！　ママーッ！<stop_lip_animation n02052 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57621.ko: <voice 01640_00057621><start_lip_sync n02052 _normal m00001>: 아빠! 엄마!<stop_lip_animation n02052 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57621.zh-Hans: <voice 01640_00057621><start_lip_sync n02052 _normal m00001>爸爸！妈妈！<stop_lip_animation n02052 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57621.zh-Hant: <voice 01640_00057621><start_lip_sync n02052 _normal m00001>爸爸！媽媽！<stop_lip_animation n02052 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57623.en:
<voice 03199_00057623><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Liselotte, you... This entire time, you've been waiting
here for us to come back...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57623.ja:
<voice 03199_00057623><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「リゼロッタ　お前は……
　あれからずっと　ここで　私たちの迎えを
　待ち続けていたというのか……。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57623.ko:
<voice 03199_00057623><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 리제롯타, 넌……
　그 후로 줄곧 우리가 데리러 오길
　기다리고 있었구나…….<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57623.zh-Hans:
<voice 03199_00057623><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>丽泽萝妲，你……
从那之后一直在这里
等着我们来接你吗……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57623.zh-Hant:
<voice 03199_00057623><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>莉賽蘿塔，妳……
從那之後就一直在這裡
等我們來接妳嗎……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57624.en:
<voice 03213_00057624><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>...Ever since I lost you, I worried about a single thing.
That it was my strict discipline that pushed away,
wasn't it...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57624.ja:
<voice 03213_00057624><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「……お前を失って以来　私は　ずっと　ひとりで
　思い悩んでいたよ。私の　厳しいしつけが
　お前を　追い詰めていたのではないかと……。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57624.ko:
<voice 03213_00057624><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: ……널 잃고 나서 나는 쭉 홀로
　괴로워했단다. 나의 엄격한 훈육이
　널 너무 몰아세운 게 아닌가 하고…….<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57624.zh-Hans:
<voice 03213_00057624><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>自从失去了你，我一直闷头烦恼，
害怕是自己严厉的管教
把你逼成了这样。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57624.zh-Hant:
<voice 03213_00057624><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……失去妳以後，
我一直都在一個人煩惱。是不是我太嚴格，
才把妳逼到沒有退路……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57625.en:
<voice 03265_00057625><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Not only was I unable to protect you, but I made you
feel helpless as well... I'm sorry, for being such a pitiful
parent...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57625.ja:
<voice 03265_00057625><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「守ってやれなかっただけでなく
　心細い思いまで　させていたとは……
　情けない親で　すまなかった……。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57625.ko:
<voice 03265_00057625><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 지켜 주지 못한 것도 모자라서
　외롭게 만들기까지 했다니……
　한심한 부모라 미안했다…….<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57625.zh-Hans:
<voice 03265_00057625><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>不光没能保护好你，
还让你受这么多委屈……
我是个不合格的父亲，对不起……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57625.zh-Hant:
<voice 03265_00057625><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>我不但沒保護好妳，
還讓妳有了難過的回憶……
我真是個丟臉的父親，對不起……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57626.en:
<voice 03465_00057626><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>I was preparing to, one of these days, offer this at your
grave. Will you accept it...?<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57626.ja:
<voice 03465_00057626><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「これは　いつの日か
　お前の墓に供えようと　用意していた物だ。
　受け取ってくれるか……？<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57626.ko:
<voice 03465_00057626><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 이건 언젠가
　네 무덤에 놓으려고 준비한 거란다.
　받아 주겠니……?<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57626.zh-Hans:
<voice 03465_00057626><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>这是我准备的，
本想什么时候放在你的墓前，
现在你可以收下吗？<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57626.zh-Hant:
<voice 03465_00057626><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>這是我打算
在妳墓前供奉的東西。
妳願意收下嗎……？<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57627.en:
<voice 03645_00057627><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>The whole time you had been together with Lucolia.
I hope, in that world, you aren't lonely...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57627.ja:
<voice 03645_00057627><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「ずっと　ルコリアと一緒だったお前が
　あの世で　さびしくないようにと思ってな……。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57627.ko:
<voice 03645_00057627><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 늘 루코리아와 함께였던 네가
　그쪽 세상에서 외롭지 않았으면 해서…….<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57627.zh-Hans:
<voice 03645_00057627><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>你一直和露珂莉娅在一起，
我怕你一个人在那个世界会寂寞……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57627.zh-Hant:
<voice 03645_00057627><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>我是想讓一直和露可莉亞形影不離的妳，
至少在那個世界不會感到寂寞……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57628.en: <voice 03850_00057628><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>...I knew it, we really are dead, aren't we.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57628.ja:
<voice 03850_00057628><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「……やっぱり　私たちは
　すでに　死んでいたのね。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57628.ko:
<voice 03850_00057628><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: ……역시 우린
　이미 죽은 게 맞구나.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57628.zh-Hans: <voice 03850_00057628><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>……我们果然是已经死了。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57628.zh-Hant:
<voice 03850_00057628><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>……我們果然
已經死了對吧。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57629.en:
<voice 03945_00057629><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>I... Ever since, like you, Papa, I started keeping
everyone together, and I realized how hard it was for
you, Papa...<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57629.ja:
<voice 03945_00057629><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「私……あれから　パパと同じように
　みんなを　まとめるようになって
　パパが　どれだけ大変だったか　気づいたの。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57629.ko:
<voice 03945_00057629><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 나…… 그 후로 아빠처럼
　모두를 이끄는 입장이 되고 나서
　아빠가 얼마나 힘들었을지 깨달았어요.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57629.zh-Hans:
<voice 03945_00057629><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>我……在那之后像爸爸那样
把大家团结在一起，
我终于明白了爸爸有多辛苦。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57629.zh-Hant:
<voice 03945_00057629><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>我……從那之後變得像爸爸一樣，
把所有人凝聚在一起之後，
我才知道爸爸有多麼辛苦。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57630.en:
<voice 04085_00057630><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>I'm the one who should be apologizing. Always just
saying selfish things and causing trouble before I died;
I'm sorry.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57630.ja:
<voice 04085_00057630><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「許してほしいのは　私の方よ。
　いつもワガママばかり言って　迷惑かけたまま
　先立つことになって　ごめんなさい。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57630.ko:
<voice 04085_00057630><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 용서받고 싶은 사람은 나예요.
　늘 응석만 부리고 민폐만 끼치다가
　먼저 떠나 버려서 미안해요.<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57630.zh-Hans:
<voice 04085_00057630><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>希望得到原谅的是我才对。
我总是说些任性的话，给你添了那么多麻烦，
还这么早就离开了你们，对不起。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57630.zh-Hant:
<voice 04085_00057630><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>想要獲得原諒的人，是我才對。
我總是說些任性的話，
又做了一堆讓你困擾的事，對不起。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57631.en:
<voice 04135_00057631><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>We don't think that the adults drove us to this... So
don't blame yourselves. Take good care of Mama and
Lucolia...<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57631.ja:
<voice 04135_00057631><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「私たち　大人に追い詰められたなんて
　思ってないわ。だから　自分を責めないで。
　ママや　ルコリアを　大事にして……。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57631.ko:
<voice 04135_00057631><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 우린 어른들이 몰아세웠다고
　생각하지 않아요. 자책하지 마세요.
　엄마랑 루코리아를 잘 보살펴 주세요…….<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57631.zh-Hans:
<voice 04135_00057631><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>我们没有觉得大人在逼我们。
所以不要再自责了，
要珍惜妈妈和露珂莉娅……<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57631.zh-Hant:
<voice 04135_00057631><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>我們並不覺得
大人們嚴厲。所以，請您別怪罪自己了。
要好好珍惜媽媽和露可莉亞……<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57632.en:
<voice 04735_00057632><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>Lucolia... It's been so long, hasn't it. Since we were
separated, the whole time, I've been worried about you...<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57632.ja:
<voice 04735_00057632><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「ルコリア……ひさしぶりね。
　離ればなれになってから　ずっと
　あなたのことを　心配していたわ……。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57632.ko:
<voice 04735_00057632><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 루코리아…… 오랜만이야.
　너와 헤어진 후로 쭉
　네 걱정을 했어…….<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57632.zh-Hans:
<voice 04735_00057632><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>露珂莉娅……好久不见啊。
和你分开之后，
我一直很担心你……<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57632.zh-Hant:
<voice 04735_00057632><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>露可莉亞……好久不見了。
從我們分開以後，
我就一直很擔心妳……<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57633.en:
<voice 04885_00057633><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Big Sister... Since we were born, you have always been
by my side, and I relied on you for everything, but...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57633.ja:
<voice 04885_00057633><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「姉さん……。
　私　生まれた時から　ずっとそばにいて
　何もかも　姉さんに頼りきりだったけど……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57633.ko:
<voice 04885_00057633><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 언니…….
　난 태어날 때부터 줄곧 곁에서
　뭐든지 언니에게 기대기만 했지만……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57633.zh-Hans:
<voice 04885_00057633><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>姐姐……
我从出生的那天起，一直在
姐姐身边，什么都依赖姐姐……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57633.zh-Hant:
<voice 04885_00057633><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>姊姊……
我從出生以來就一直在姊姊身邊，
總是依賴著姊姊……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57634.en:
<voice 04985_00057634><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Now, I'll make it on my own. From now on, Big Sister,
even if you're not here, I'll be okay. Thank you for
everything...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57634.ja:
<voice 04985_00057634><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「もう　ひとりでも　やっていけるわ。
　これからは　姉さんがいなくても　大丈夫よ。
　今まで　ありがとう……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57634.ko:
<voice 04985_00057634><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 이제 혼자서도 잘할 수 있어.
　이젠 언니가 없어도 괜찮아.
　그동안 고마웠어…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57634.zh-Hans:
<voice 04985_00057634><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>现在我一个人也能做很多事了。
今后就算没有姐姐了也没关系。
谢谢你照顾我这么久……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57634.zh-Hant:
<voice 04985_00057634><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>但現在我一個人也能獨立了。
就算姊姊不在了，也不用擔心。
謝謝妳，姊姊……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57635.en:
<voice 05125_00057635><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>Th...ank... you... Luco...lia... Hearing that... gives me
peace of mind to... leave this world...<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57635.ja:
<voice 05125_00057635><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「あり…とう　ルコ…ア……。
　それを聞いて　安心…て
　この世を　去…ことができるわ……。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57635.ko:
<voice 05125_00057635><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 고…워. 루코…아…….
　그 말을 들으니 안심…고
　이곳을 떠… 수 있겠어…….<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57635.zh-Hans:
<voice 05125_00057635><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>谢……谢……露珂……娅……
听你这么说，我就能放……心地
离开这……个世界了……<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57635.zh-Hant:
<voice 05125_00057635><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>謝謝……露可……亞……
聽妳這麼說，
我就能安心地離……開……了……<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57636.en: <voice 05605_00057636><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>In the... Next life... We'll be... Together...<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57636.ja:
<voice 05605_00057636><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>「次　生…れてくる時も　また……
　あなたと……<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57636.ko:
<voice 05605_00057636><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>: 다시 태…나도 또……
　너랑……<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57636.zh-Hans:
<voice 05605_00057636><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>下辈子……我还想……
和你……<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57636.zh-Hant:
<voice 05605_00057636><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>如果還有……來生……
再一起……<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57638.en:
<voice 06805_00057638><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>...Lucolia. Thanks to you, we were able to see Liselotte
again.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57638.ja:
<voice 06805_00057638><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「……ルコリア。お前のおかげで
　また　リゼロッタに会うことができた。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57638.ko:
<voice 06805_00057638><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: ……루코리아. 네 덕분에
　다시 리제롯타를 만날 수 있었구나.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57638.zh-Hans:
<voice 06805_00057638><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……露珂莉娅。多亏了你，
我们才能再见到丽泽萝妲。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57638.zh-Hant:
<voice 06805_00057638><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……露可莉亞，多虧了妳，
我才能再次見到莉賽蘿塔。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57639.en:
<voice 06840_00057639><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Until now, I didn't try to properly face you, I could not
bear the thought and only lashed out at you; truly I'm
sorry.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57639.ja:
<voice 06840_00057639><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「今まで　ちゃんと　お前と向き合おうとせず
　やりきれない思いを　ぶつけてばかりで
　本当に　すまなかったな。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57639.ko:
<voice 06840_00057639><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 그동안 널 마주보려 하지 않고
　답답한 마음을 퍼붓기만 해서
　정말로 미안했다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57639.zh-Hans:
<voice 06840_00057639><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>至今为止我都不愿面对你，
还把自己心里的郁闷发泄到你身上，
真是对不起。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57639.zh-Hant:
<voice 06840_00057639><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>一直不願意好好面對妳，
只因為自己的無能對妳亂發脾氣，
我真的很對不起。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57640.en:
<voice 06995_00057640><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...We've both been taking it out on each other, so let's
start over.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57640.ja:
<voice 06995_00057640><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……やつあたりしてたのは　お互い様だし
　そんなの　今さら　言いっこなしよ。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57640.ko:
<voice 06995_00057640><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……괜한 화풀이를 한 건 나도 마찬가지니까
　없었던 일로 해요, 우리.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57640.zh-Hans:
<voice 06995_00057640><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……我也向爸爸乱发过脾气，
这种事就不要再提了。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57640.zh-Hant:
<voice 06995_00057640><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……我也都在亂發脾氣，
不用計較那麼多啦。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57641.en:
<voice 07090_00057641><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I, until now, only disobeyed you, Papa, but I was happy
that you protected me from that monster. Thanks... Papa.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57641.ja:
<voice 07090_00057641><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「私　今まで　パパに逆らってばかりだったけど
　魔物から守ってくれて　うれしかったわ。
　ありがと……パパ。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57641.ko:
<voice 07090_00057641><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 난 그동안 아빠에게 반항만 했지만
　마물로부터 지켜 줘서 기뻤어요.
　고마워요…… 아빠.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57641.zh-Hans:
<voice 07090_00057641><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>我以前虽然总是和爸爸对着干，
但还是很高兴你从怪物手里保护了我。
谢谢……爸爸。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57641.zh-Hant:
<voice 07090_00057641><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>雖然我總是在和爸爸頂嘴，
但是你從怪物手中保護了我，我很高興。
謝謝你……爸爸。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57642.en:
<voice 07525_00057642><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...<pc>, we were able to see my sister and the
others because you brought back the diary.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57642.ja:
<voice 07525_00057642><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……<pc>さん。私たちが　こうして
　姉さんたちと会うことができたのも
　あなたが持ってきてくれた　日記帳のおかげ。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57642.ko:
<voice 07525_00057642><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……<pc> 씨. 우리가 이렇게
　언니와 아이들을 만날 수 있었던 것도
　당신이 가져다준 일기장 덕분이야.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57642.zh-Hans:
<voice 07525_00057642><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……<pc>，我们能见到姐姐她们，
都是多亏了你带来的那本日记。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57642.zh-Hant:
<voice 07525_00057642><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……<pc>，我們能像這樣
和姊姊她們相見，
都是多虧了你拿來的日記。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57643.en:
<voice 07560_00057643><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>You saved, not only Celed, but all of our hearts too;
how can we ever repay you?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57643.ja:
<voice 07560_00057643><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「セレドの町だけじゃなく　私たちの心も
　救ってくれた　あなたに
　どうすれば　お礼が　できるかしら……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57643.ko:
<voice 07560_00057643><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 셀레도 마을뿐 아니라 우리의 마음까지
　구해 준 당신에게
　어떻게 보답하면 좋을까…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57643.zh-Hans:
<voice 07560_00057643><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>你不仅拯救了塞莱德镇，
还拯救了我们的心，
我们要怎么感谢你才好呢……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57643.zh-Hant:
<voice 07560_00057643><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>不只是塞萊德鎮，
你還拯救了我們的心，
我該如何才能報答你呢……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57644.en:
<voice 07600_00057644><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>That said, on behalf of the entire town, I have the
privilege of thanking you. Now, please accept this.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57644.ja:
<voice 07600_00057644><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「そういうことでしたら　町全体を代表して
　私から　お礼をさせていただきましょう。
　さあ　これを　お受け取りください。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57644.ko:
<voice 07600_00057644><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 그거라면 마을 전체를 대표해서
　제가 답례하도록 하겠습니다.
　자, 이걸 받으세요.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57644.zh-Hans:
<voice 07600_00057644><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>这样的话，就由我代表塞莱德镇
向你表示谢意。
请收下这个。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57644.zh-Hant:
<voice 07600_00057644><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>這樣的話，
就讓我代表全鎮來回禮吧。
來，請收下這份謝禮。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！

57645.en:
<voice 07730_00057645><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>If you are ever in Celed again, please stop by my home.
Lucolia would be delighted too, don't you think.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57645.ja:
<voice 07730_00057645><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「また　セレドの町まで　お越しの際は
　我が家に　寄っていってください。
　ルコリアも　よろこぶでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57645.ko:
<voice 07730_00057645><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 셀레도 마을에 또 오시면
　저희 집에 들렀다 가세요.
　루코리아도 기뻐할 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57645.zh-Hans:
<voice 07730_00057645><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>你下次再来塞莱德镇的时候，
请一定要来我家坐坐。
露珂莉娅也会很高兴的。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57645.zh-Hant:
<voice 07730_00057645><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>等你再來塞萊德鎮，
請一定要到我家坐坐。
露可莉亞也會很高興的。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57646.en: <voice 08105_00057646><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...<pc>, truly, thank you!<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57646.ja: <voice 08105_00057646><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……<pc>さん　本当に　ありがとう！<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57646.ko: <voice 08105_00057646><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……<pc> 씨, 정말 고마워!<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57646.zh-Hant: <voice 08105_00057646><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……<pc>，真的很謝謝你！<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57647.en:
Mayor Burat, Lucolia, and the rest of the adults that
she brought returned to town.
57647.ja:
ブラト町長は　ルコリアと
町の大人たちを連れて　町に戻っていった。
57647.ko:
블라트 촌장은 루코리아와
마을 어른들을 데리고 마을로 돌아갔다.
57647.zh-Hans:
布莱特镇长带着露珂莉娅和
镇上的人一起回镇子了。
57647.zh-Hant:
布萊特鎮長和露可莉亞
帶著鎮上的大人們回去了。

29000074.en:
<voice 08406_29000074><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>In the end, those brats still died... I mean, were still
dead, huh.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000074.ja:
<voice 08406_29000074><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「結局　あのガキどもは
　死んだまま……っていうか
　死んでたんだな。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000074.ko:
<voice 08406_29000074><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 결국 그 아이들은 영영 죽은 채로……
　아니, 이미 오래전에 죽은 거였군.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000074.zh-Hans:
<voice 08406_29000074><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>结果，那些小鬼
就是死了……应该说，
早就已经死了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000074.zh-Hant:
<voice 08406_29000074><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>結果，那些小鬼
就是死了……應該說，
早就已經死了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000075.ja: <voice 08407_29000075><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「かわいそう……。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000076.en:
<voice 08408_29000076><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>But... But they were able to tell each other their feelings.
That much was good, I believe.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000076.ja:
<voice 08408_29000076><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「でも……でも
　お互いの思いが　伝えられた。
　それだけは　良かったと思います。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000076.ko:
<voice 08408_29000076><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 하지만…… 하지만
　서로의 마음을 전할 수 있었잖아요.
　그것만은 다행이라고 생각해요.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000076.zh-Hans:
<voice 08408_29000076><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>不过……不过
他们的心意传达给彼此了。
只有那点是值得庆幸的。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000076.zh-Hant:
<voice 08408_29000076><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>不過……不過
他們的心意傳達給彼此了。
只有那點是值得慶幸的。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000077.en:
<voice 08409_29000077><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>If only I, too, could tell my father and mother my
feelings now...<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000077.ja:
<voice 08409_29000077><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「ぼくも　お父さんとお母さんに
　今の思いを　伝えられたら……。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000077.ko:
<voice 08409_29000077><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 저도 부모님께
　지금의 제 마음을 전할 수 있다면…….<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000077.zh-Hans:
<voice 08409_29000077><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>要是我也能把现在的心意
传达给爸爸妈妈就好了……<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000077.zh-Hant:
<voice 08409_29000077><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>要是我也能把現在的心意
傳達給爸爸媽媽就好了……<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
